snippet: “All along, I’ve proven to be right,” the president-elect told reporters, speaking of the truck rampage that killed 12 and injured dozens....
abstract: Donald Trump appears to suggest truck attack in Berlin vindicates his plans to bar Muslims from entering United States; cryptic remarks made to reporters leave room for interpretation, but aide Jason Miller states Trump's comments refer to his intent to suspend immigrants from countries with high terrorist activity.
lead_paragraph: “All along, I’ve proven to be right,” the president-elect told reporters, speaking of the truck rampage that killed 12 and injured dozens.

headline.main: Trump Suggests Berlin Attack Affirms His Plan to Bar Muslims
headline.print_headline: Trump Suggests Berlin Rampage Affirms His Plan to Bar Muslims
